name: BloMad v1.0
description:
BloMad (early access) is a very basic game based on Minecraft made in Python Ursina Engine. You have 6 different blocks and an area of 31x31 blocks. You can build anything you want.  The game is under development and a lot of features will be implemented in the future versions of this game. 

Controls: 

1 = for grass block

2 = for cobble stone block

3 = for stone block

4 = For oak wood block

5 = For birch wood block

6 = For dirt block

Player Movement: 

WASD for player movement

Spacebar for jump

(Crouch and sprint under testing. not in the game)
